title: Having Trouble Logging In
body:
I enter my username and password correctly but its saying
Username or Password is Incorrect. Please try logging in again
I've tried it with my brothers account and my smurf and it still says the same thing I know I haven't been hacked cause it let me log on the LoL Website so I dont know whats going on

replies.body: Having the same issues, can log in via site with main/smurf accounts etc but can not log via client. Can't seem to find any admin posts/fixes about it yet. I see there are a few that are popping up on the forum though. :(
I've got an issue as well, has your email account associated to that account been changed too?
Same problem here! Problem was solved by changing my region to NA then putting back to OCE.. But now got one leave (remake) and some Lp lost :(
